DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date examination of the chest, part of the human body between the neck and the diaphragm, or abdomen, the area of the body that contains the pancreas, stomach, intestine, liver, gallbladder, and other organs, by any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the examination of the chest, part of the human body between the neck and the diaphragm, or abdomen, the area of the body that contains the pancreas, stomach, intestine, liver, gallbladder, and other organs, by any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredDefinition: The part of the human body between the neck and the diaphragm or the corresponding part in other vertebrates.:Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: The anterior side of the thorax from the neck to the abdomen. The shape of the chest is often regarded as potential insight into a disease process, as in the case of barrel chest and respiratory dysfunction.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
